item.description:
Hi Guys,

Philip is away this week so I'm covering this monday too. I think he is back for the St. Patricks climb though! I think the gym has guiness or four leaf clovers at the top that night. ;-) In the meantime ...

Yo everyone, sign up. We will climb Metro Rock on Mondays. Let's have fun.

You will need to be belay tested if you are an experienced climber but new to the gym. You should also take a class at Metrorock if you have never climbed before - call them. They have a shuttle to the gym from the T - Wellington Station if you don't have a car. Look up Metro Rock's web site - or call them.

Thanks,
Susan
item.how_to_find_us: We meet at the picnic table at 7pm. I'm the gal in my picture - upright.
item.name: Metrorock Everett
